globals.title: Celso Mireles 3
globals.description: Somewhere between artist, engineer, and organizer. I am a freelance web developer and graphic designer that specializes in non-profits and social justice organizations. I am also an undocumented immigrant in the United States with the temporary benefit of a DACA (Deferred Action for Chilhood Arrivals) work permit. I try to not let it get to my head.
globals.user_description: I am a freelance web developer and graphic designer that specializes in non-profits and social justice organizations.
globals.user_title: Somewhere between artist, engineer, and organizer.
